title: Plot the Drama
text:
I wanted to build an interactive web app that lets you explore episode-level ratings across seasons for your favorite TV shows.
Built with Streamlit and Plotly, it uses data from the TVMaze API to generate dynamic heatmaps, helping visualize which seasons soared â€” and which episodes flopped.
Whether youâ€™re trying to decide where to pick up a long-running series, or just want to settle a debate over which season of Greyâ€™s Anatomy peaked, this tool gives you the insights â€” without the spoilers.
Link to the Streamlit app and GitHub repo developed to build this.

title: Mehak Gurnani
text:
Hiya!
Iâ€™m Mehak, a Data Scientist based in London with experience in academia and the MedTech sector.
My academic background includes a BSc in Medical Biosciences and an MSc in Health Data Analytics and Machine Learning, both from Imperial College London.
This site highlights my work and projects, applying data analytics and AI to a range of tasks â€” from storytelling with visualizations to modeling larger, complex datasets.
